name: Swan Syndrome
description:
A 3D psychological exploration walking sim loosely based off of Aesop's fable "The Crow and the Swan".

------------ INSTRUCTIONS & BUGS --------------------

  • Bug: don't click while you're making a decision, it'll lock you out of decision making --> need to restart the game
  • Bug: Build doesn't load the start node properly, press "O" in the Sky Zone  (the first area) to start the game.

Game info - 2 possible endings
